title: EvidenceSet
description: Collection of evidence items used as inputs to a model decision or explanation.

evidence.description: List of evidence items that were available to the model at decision time.

evidenceId.description: Identifier for this evidence item, typically a stable feature name.

evidenceType.description: Type of evidence (e.g., feature, derived, externalReference).

value.description: The value of this evidence item.

source.description: Source system or dataset from which this evidence item was obtained.

timestamp.description: Time when this evidence item was observed or derived.

provenanceRef.description: Reference to a provenance record for this evidence item.
